EXCEPTIONS.INTERNAL_ERROR: Woops, we got an error in the backend, please try again. If it keeps failing please check the logs for more details.
EXCEPTIONS.NOT_FOUND: Oops, didn't find what you are looking for.
EXCEPTIONS.TOKEN_FAILED: Getting Emby token failed. Please check your credentials and address.
EXCEPTIONS.EMBY_CALL_FAILED: Call to Emby server failed, please check if Emby is running and if the credentials are still correct.
EXCEPTIONS.MOVIENOTFOUND: Movie not found, starting a media sync job could fix this.
EXCEPTIONS.EPISODENOTFOUND: Episode not found, starting a media sync job could fix this.
EXCEPTIONS.CANTCONNECTTOGITHUB: Can't connect to GitHub to check for updates. Try again later.
EXCEPTIONS.NOUPDATEFILE: Can't locate the update application, no update performed
EXCEPTIONS.UPDATEUNPACKERROR: Something when wrong while unpacking the update package. Please try again.
EXCEPTIONS.TVDBLOGINFAILED: TheTVDB login failed, check the API key.

WIZARD.USERDETAILTEXT: Provide a username and password for your admin user
WIZARD.STEPONE: Checking if API key is valid ({{step}}/{{total}})
WIZARD.CROWDINHELP: If your language is not mentioned or not complete, feel free to help me translate the app in your langauge on Crowdin
WIZARD.INTROTEXT:
Welcome to the EmbyStat server wizard.

With this wizard we will setup the basic settings so you can start working with EmbyStat without to much headache. When the wizard is completed you can enjoy all features of the server. If you want to tweak the server some more you can always go to the settings page.
WIZARD.NOTFOUNDTEXT: We could not detect media server in your network. Fill in your server details manually in the form.
WIZARD.FOUNDTEXT: We found the following servers in your network. Select the one you want to connect to. If your server is not displayed you can create a server connection manually.
WIZARD.SELECTLIBRARIES: Select all libraries you want to include in the {{type}} statistics calculations. All {{type}} libraries are selected by default. If you want you can change it later in the settings page.
WIZARD.FINISHED: All settings are saved and you can start using your EmbyStat server now. Enjoy your new statistics!
WIZARD.FINISHEXPLANATION: Best thing to do first is start a movie and show synchronization job. EmbyStat will start downloading all data from your {{type}} server. Keep in mind that these tasks can take a long time depending on your collection size. You can start the jobs manually by navigating to the Jobs page after login.

JELLYFIN.ADMINTEXT: Because you are using Jellyfin you have to provide an administrator account that you want to use to fetch data from the server. Select the preferred administrator from the dropdown list.

WIZARD.APIKEYFAILED: We tried to contact your {{type}} server but it seems to fail. Please go back, correct the configuration and try again.
WIZARD.LANWANCHOISE: Choose the correct address to use for your connection to the {{type}} server.
WIZARD.ADMINCREATEFAILED: Creating the admin account failed, check the logs for more details.

SETTINGS.SAVEFAILED: Saving settings failed, check log files for more info.

TMDB.TITLE: TMDb connection
TMDB.APIKEYWARNING: If you want you can supply EmbyStat with your own TMDb API key here. Make sure you supply a working API key! If the key is incorrect the synchronization task will fail.
TMDB.NOAPIKEY: API key can not be empty

ROLLBAR.TITLE: Rollbar
ROLLBAR.EXCEPTIONLOGGING: Enable/disable the exception logging to the online Rollbar service. With this logging I can debug and fix the application faster. No personal data is ever recorded, only exception messages, stacktrace, OS name and version number.

ACCOUNT.TITLE: User details
ACCOUNT.PASSWORDMINLENGTH: Password length must be minimal 6 characters
ACCOUNT.PASSWORDWARNING: You only need to fill in a new password if you want to change your current password.
ACCOUNT.USERNAMEUPDATEFAILED: Username update failed, check logging for more info

STATISTICS.TOSHORTTEXT: To find the movies that are suspiciously short we need to know what the amount of minutes you find too short for a movie. Default this is set to 10 minutes but you can change it if needed.

MOVIE.COLLECTIONTYPES: Select all {{type}} collection types that you want to be able to select in the collection dropdown on the movie statistics page.

SHOW.COLLECTIONTYPES: Select all {{type}} collection types that you want to be able to select in the collection dropdown on the show statistics page.

MEDIASERVER.NOBASEURL: Base URL is required and should start with /
MEDIASERVER.APIKEYHINT: Go to advanced -> security on your {{type}} server to generate a new API token.
MEDIASERVER.BASEURLHINT: Base url needs to start with a /
MEDIASERVER.BASEURLNEEDED: I need to set a base url
MEDIASERVER.BASEURLNEEDEDTOOLTIP: You probably don't need this if you are not behind a reverse proxy!
MEDIASERVER.WRONGAPIKEY: Provided API key is not valid
MEDIASERVER.CHANGESERVERTYPE: You configured a {{currentType}} server, if you want to switch to {{newType}} you will have to reinstall the application.

UPDATE.ONBETA: You are not on the Master train anymore so you can't switch back to it. If you want to go back on the master train, please reinstall the server.
UPDATE.TRAINWARNING: Here you can change the update train from master to beta. If you don't know what you are doing just leave this setting on Master. If you want to receive the Beta updates change it here, be aware that you can't go back to Master later. You will have to reinstall the server.
UPDATE.CANTCHECK: Can't check for updates now, unable to connect to GitHub.
UPDATE.DISABLED: Updates are disabled for this server and will probably be updated by an external service. If this is a mistake don't start the server with the --no-updates option.

INFO.PINGDESCRIPTION: Ping the Emby server to check if he is still online.
INFO.SYSTEM-SYNCDESCRIPTION: Perform a small sync with Emby server. This is a fast and small system update only.
INFO.SHOW-SYNCDESCRIPTION: Perform an incremental sync for your show collection. This can take some time to run!
INFO.MOVIE-SYNCDESCRIPTION: Perform an incremental sync for your movie collection. This can take some time to run!
INFO.UPDATE-CHECKERDESCRIPTION: Checks for new updates on your selected update train.

NOMOVIETYPEFOUND.TITLE: No movies found
NOMOVIETYPEFOUND.BODY: We couldn't find any movies in the EmbyStat database. If you have movies in {{type}} you should try starting a new media syncronisation task.

NOSHOWTYPEFOUND.TITLE: No shows found
NOSHOWTYPEFOUND.BODY: We couldn't find any shows in the EmbyStat database. If you have shows in {{type}} you should try starting a new media syncronisation task.

MEDIASYNCTASKRUNNING.TITLE: Media sync task is running
MEDIASYNCTASKRUNNING.BODY: The media syncronisation task is running in the background. Because of this all statistics pages are block because the calculations would be completely wrong as long as the sync is running.

EDIT_TRIGGER.FORMAT_ERROR: Given cron string is in a wrong format. Check here for formatting rules. Only numbers, spaces, *, / and - are allowed.
EDIT_TRIGGER.CRON_HELPER: Here you can find more information on how to format a CRON string. Only numbers, *, / and - are allowed.

NOUSERSFOUND.TITLE: No users found
NOUSERSFOUND.BODY: No users are found in the local database. This means that no small sync job as run. You want to run it now?

LOADER.UPDATINGSUB: Page will refresh when the update is finished.

THANKS.TITLE: Thanks
THANKS.TEXT: A big thanks to the following people for translating the app in their native language:
